text:
Tourism Tasmania Order 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 52(1)(b) of the Tourism Tasmania Act 1996 .

9 December 2002

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. Bacon

Minister for Tourism, Parks and Heritage

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Tourism Tasmania Order 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Tourism Tasmania Act 1996 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
See Schedule 1 .

SCHEDULE 1

Clause 4

The amendments effected by Clause 4 and this Schedule have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Tourism Tasmania Act 1996 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 December 2002

This order is administered in the Department of Tourism, Parks, Heritage and the Arts.
